name: vanus-enlightenment
description: This is a discord bot written in node.js with the use of discord.js. Originally made for the Emerald Immersion discord server. It is used to get online players from the Emerald Immersion outfit on Miller (game: Planetside 2, a.k.a: Awesomeside 2).

scripts.create_db: mysql -e 'create database if not exists vanus_enlightenment'; mysql vanus_enlightenment < db_create_tables.sql

author: Brakenium
